about_the_game:
Darkness of Memories is a 2D side-scrolling action roguelike game set in the Edo period of Japan, featuring a samurai-themed storyline. The game immerses players in a mystical and challenging world, offering a unique experience with character progression, permadeath, and procedurally generated levels.

Story and Theme:

The game follows the journey of Haruto, a samurai warrior who embarks on a quest after losing his memory. Wounded and unable to recall anything from his past, Haruto awakens in a small Japanese restaurant. As he begins to rediscover his abilities through the guidance of the restaurant’s chef and other locals, Haruto sets off on an epic adventure. His journey takes him across various Japanese locales, from mysterious villages to dark temples. Along the way, he gradually regains fragments of his memories, facing formidable foes and engaging in epic battles. This quest ultimately forces him to confront his dark past and unravel a profound mystery.

Gameplay and Mechanics:

Roguelike Structure: Darkness of Memories is enriched with roguelike mechanics. Each death allows the player to respawn with stronger abilities. The procedurally generated levels and permadeath feature ensure a unique experience with every playthrough.

Character Development: Players can customize their character through an advanced skill tree and carefully crafted special abilities. Every skill and power influences combat strategies, offering a personalized gameplay experience.

Combat Mechanics: The game features a variety of combat techniques and strategies to defeat challenging enemies. Haruto’s abilities include poisoning and freezing opponents, making battles more dynamic.

Environmental Interactions: Players can enhance their character by collecting elixirs from the environment and using enemies’ weapons to continue their fight.

Visual and Technical Features:

Art Style: The 2D side-scrolling graphics reflect traditional Japanese art, creating a visually striking and immersive dark, mystical atmosphere.

Dynamism and Randomization: Procedurally generated levels present a new challenge in each playthrough, enhancing the game’s replayability and keeping the experience fresh.

Target Audience and Market:

Darkness of Memories appeals to players who enjoy action and roguelike games. It will also attract those interested in samurai themes and Japanese culture. Targeted towards players aged 16-40, the game offers a challenging yet rewarding experience for both seasoned gamers and newcomers alike.

Development and Future Plans:

Development Process: The game is currently in early development, with regular updates adding new features. Continuous expansion is planned through content updates, new levels, and character customization options.

Progress and Distribution: Darkness of Memories will soon be showcased at various gaming expos and digital platforms. The goal is to reach a broad player base both locally and internationally.

Darkness of Memories promises an unforgettable experience with its deep gameplay mechanics and captivating atmosphere. This game is poised to carve out a strong niche in a growing market, drawing interest from both investors and players.
